content.rendered:
[vc_section][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1599713958016{padding-top: 500px !important;}”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text]

If you need more help

[vc_column_text]We’d love to hear from you. Tell us your feedback, how you loved our food, what changes you’d like to see, any inconveniences you experienced or any suggestions you have for us to help serve you better. Drop us an email or call us, we’ll be there.[/vc_column_text]
  • +91 95396 95395
  • support@fabeat.in
  • 46/3390 Arakkakadavu Road Vennala Kochi - 682028
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”What payment methods exist in your company?” tab_id=”1568282635582-254bfc81-ee9c”][vc_column_text]

  • We have all kind of E-payments (Debit/credit cards and Online UPI payments)

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I return the product after purchase?” tab_id=”1568284227046-386cc7c0-717d”][vc_column_text]

  • All our consumable products are non-returnable but we will try to put a smile on your face. So please contact us on our helpline for any issues.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I purchase a gift certificate?” tab_id=”1568284226766-7bb39ae6-4ed5″][vc_column_text]

  • We hear you. It is just on the way.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What if the prepaid goods are not delivered?” tab_id=”1568284226631-feb6af68-7330″][vc_column_text]

  • The replacement order will be initiated if our original order is missed/Lost in transit.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What quality of products can I expect?” tab_id=”1568284226489-ec9522b4-13e2″][vc_column_text]

  • All our raw materials are organic and farm grown. So you know the rest.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I choose a customized Meal plan other than the Weekly package on the website?” tab_id=”1568284226339-4e5e5c4a-5269″][vc_column_text]

  • For individual orders please find us through our delivery partners Swiggy/Zomato and reach out on our Helpline number for any other customized Meal plans.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I get a customize Meal plan according to my Fitness needs?” tab_id=”1568284226196-3ccdbcf3-689a”][vc_column_text]

  • Yes, please reach out on our helpline number so our Dietitian can access your goals/needs and offer you plans which will aid in helping you attain it.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do you offer have in-house delivery?” tab_id=”1568284226049-95265b22-84ac”][vc_column_text]

  • Yes, we do offer in-house delivery which is chargeable. You can also do a Take Away depending on your convenience.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I get it delivered to my office as I am a working employee?” tab_id=”1568284225685-b895cc46-5e9f”][vc_column_text]

  • Yes. Do feel free to reach out to us as we have special pocket friendly plans for working employee and students.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do I get a healthy alternative for a sweet tooth cravings?” tab_id=”1568284224811-fae3d4fc-25e6″][vc_column_text]

  • We have a special menu just for you. Check out our product page. You will love us!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is it just my Diet requirement that FabEat can cater to?” tab_id=”1568284293268-17744cba-3217″][vc_column_text]

  • No, we are tying up with professionals who currently working on it. You will be able to avail our Personal Training sessions soon.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is it that FabEat believes in? Why FabEat” tab_id=”1568284292782-b6778583-e413″][vc_column_text]

  • We never wanted people to think of healthy eating as bland and boring. We have crafted our meals in such a way that you never have to even think having a cheat meal another day. Why even cheat when we are there for you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
